name: BOXING RETIREMENT SIM 2K15
description:
you play a retired boxer, once a legend in his day, all he knows in life is boxing. after being forced into retirement and on vacation, how will he cope when all he knows is boxing?

CONTROLS:

XBOX:

RT: RIGHT PUNCH

LT: LEFT PUNCH

RB: RUN

LS: MOVE

RS: LOOK

MOUSE/KEYBOARD:

LEFT CLICK: LEFT PUNCH

RIGHT CLICK: RIGHT PUNCH

WASD: MOVE

MOUSE: LOOK

didn't really finish it all to much, but i got the concept working and i really want to expand on it hot damn
